com.pcloud.networking.protocol

Class BytesWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pcloud.networking.protocol.BytesWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProtocolRequestWriter, ProtocolWriter, java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class BytesWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProtocolRequestWriter
    Writes bytes into a sink

    An implementation of a ProtocolRequestWriter which is able to write bytes into a BufferedSink

    Generally used to write a network request

    See Also:
    ProtocolWriter, ProtocolRequestWriter, BufferedSink
